parameters.name: ResourceARN
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Amazon FSx resource that you want to tag.

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: A list of tags for the resource. If a tag with a given key already exists, the value is replaced by the one specified in this parameter. (dict) --- Specifies a key-value pair for a resource tag. A value that specifies the TagKey, the name of the tag. Tag keys must be unique for the resource to which they are attached. A value that specifies the TagValue, the value assigned to the corresponding tag key. Tag values can be null and don't have to be unique in a tag set. For example, you can have a key-value pair in a tag set of finances : April and also of payroll : April.

nested_params.name: Key
nested_params.description: A value that specifies the TagKey, the name of the tag. Tag keys must be unique for the resource to which they are attached.

nested_params.name: Value
nested_params.description: A value that specifies the TagValue, the value assigned to the corresponding tag key. Tag values can be null and don't have to be unique in a tag set. For example, you can have a key-value pair in a tag set of finances : April and also of payroll : April.
